item.title: MongoDb + mongoose 个人整理
item.description: 连接mongodb var mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect('mongodb://admin:password@host:port/dbname'); //test connectionString = 'mongodb://localhost/Node-tao', 定义一个schema new Schema({..}, options); ###Note that if the resulting record is converted to an object or JSON, virtuals are not included by default. Passvirtuals : true to either toObject() or to toJSON() to have them returned. // 虚拟属性开关
